intro: Elatostema jiangjinense, commonly known as the Jiangjin stellate elatostema, is a rare species of plant native to China. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettle and related plants. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered leaves and unique floral structures. It typically grows in shaded, moist environments, such as forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a valuable subject for botanical research and conservation efforts.
